text: I kogato priekhme vashiya obet, i vuzdignakhme nad vas Planinata [vi rekokhme]: “Khvanete zdravo tova, koeto vi dadokhme, i poslushaite!” Rekokha: “Chukhme i se vuzprotivikhme.” I v tyakhnoto neverie surtsata im byakha propiti s teletsa. Kazhi: “Kolko losho e onova, koeto vashata vyara vi povelyava, ako ste vyarvashti!”
